author: hatakeyamak
body:
#### PR description:

Suppress unnecessary warning for tracks with |eta|>3 not extrapolated to ECAL and HCAL which happens in the phase2 scenarios. Also, update PFTrackTransformer to allow extrapolation of tracks to HF.

#### PR validation:

Compiles. Matrix tests run. Also made sure no change to reco as we are not using extrapolated tracks to HF yet. This is a step 1.
http://hep.baylor.edu/hatake/PFval/val_10_6_0_FwdTrkExtrapolation/

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This is not backport.

@bendavid
title: PF tracks to HF extrapolation for Phase2 (and suppress unnecessary warnings)
